name: Tricky Temple
description:
It's not an easy life, being a God...especially when Professor Ignatius Crumble and The Evil Adventurers Society have broken into your temple! The dastardly doctor and his awful apprentices are trying to steal your precious relics. Luckily, you can construct and empower Totem Towers - bewitched buildings that’ll send those pesky professors packing, and save your treasure from being put in a stupid, boring museum.

Tricky Temple is an all-new augmented reality take on the tower defense genre using the Merge Cube; the AR toy and game system. With a unique, six-sided play surface that you hold in your
hand, this is unlike any other tower defense game out there.

Key Features
Build customisable towers to match your playstyle.
Experience Tricky Temple in both AR and VR.
Uses the all-new, award winning Merge Cube for a truly unique experience
A host of fun and quirky characters to chase off your property
Suitable for all ages - easy to learn, hard to master!

Tricky Temple requires a Merge Cube to play.
